long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes annoying numbers from Bluesky.

- In posts
  - replies
  - reposts & quotes
  - likes
- In profile
  - followers
  - following
  - posts
- In navigation bar
  - notifications
  - messages
- In notifications-list
  - details
- "Suggested for you" block

You can choose to show them, show them on hover, or hide them.

Storage permission is required to save settings.
